entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
